alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:47AM CDT until May 13 at 11:10PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding begins at 18 feet, flooding of low lying pastures along the west bank. At 20.0 feet, Pastures along west bank will flood. There may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding. At 22.0 feet, Commercial and industrial facilities in the flood plain along the left bank may be affected. Water is deep in the pastures along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Friday afternoon, May 12, and continue falling to 5.5 feet Wednesday morning, May 17. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 22.9 Fri 8 AM 10.3 8.3 7.0 FALLING &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
